GK19bahcar6u:19: jāte ca svapnāvaśeṣadarśane hṛdayāvaśeṣāvasthāne citrāvaśeṣākṛtau kāvyāvaśeṣanāmni naranāthe,

GK19bahcar6u:64: abhūmibhūtena kālakramopacayānāṃ śokena kavalīkṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaramapaśyat /

GK19bahcar6u:89: śaiśava evāgrāhi guṇavatpatākeva bhavatā tātasya cittavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:90: yato bhavantamevaṃ vidhaṃ vidheyaṃ vidhighidhānopanatanairghṛṇyamidaṃ kimapi bibhaṇiṣati me hṛdayam /

GK19bahcar6u:102: svabhāvasya seyaṃ kāpuruṣatā vā straiṇaṃ vā yadevamāspadaṃ pitṛśokahutabhujo jāto 'smi /
GK19bahcar6u:103: mama hi bhūbhṛti paryaste niravaśeṣataḥ prasravaṇānīva srutānyaśrūṇyastamite mahati tejasyandhakārībhūtadaśāśasya pranaṣṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:107: pade pade digdharopāhateva hariṇī muhyati matiḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:108: puruṣadveṣiṇīva dūrata eva bhramati pariharantī spṛtiḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:115: tāto hutāśanatāmeva kevalāmāpanno 'pi naivaṃ dahati mām /
GK19bahcar6u:116: antastadevamidamasāṃparāyikamiva hṛdayamavaṣṭabhya vyutthitaḥ śokau durnivāro vāḍava iva vārirāśim,
GK19bahcar6u:120: dahati dārayati tanūkaroti kavalayati ca mām /
GK19bahcar6u:121: kāmaṃ na śaknoti me hṛdayaṃ tādṛśasya samerukalpasya kalpamahāpuruṣasya vinipātamaśrubindubhireva kevalairativāhayitum /
GK19bahcar6u:122: rājye viṣa iva cakorasya me viraktaṃ cakṣuḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:124: kṣaṇamapi dagdhagṛhe śakuniriva na pārayāmi thātum /

GK19bahcar6u:148: yā tu mayi rājājñā sā dagdho 'pi dāhakāriṇī mayyavagrahaglapite dhanvanīvāṅgāravṛṣṭiḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:203: kiṃvadantī ca yathā kilānāyakaṃ sādhanaṃ matvā jighṛkṣuḥ sudurmatiretāmapi bhuvamājigamiṣati /
GK19bahcar6u:209: kṛpābhūmibhūtāyāśca svasuḥ snehātsa tādṛśo 'pi baddhamūlo 'pyatyantagururekapada evāsya nanāsya nanāśa śokāvegaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:210: viveśa ca sahasā kesarīva giriguhāgṛhaṃ gabhīrahṛdayaṃ bhayaṅkaraḥ kopāvegaḥ /

GK19bahcar6u:237: yadi bāla iti nitarāṃ tarhi na parityājyo 'smi /

GK19bahcar6u:263: mama tu durnivārāyāmasyāṃ vipakṣakṣapaṇakṣudhi kṣubhitāyāṃ kṣamyatāmayamekākinaḥ kopakavala ekaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:271: svayūthabhraṣṭa iva vanyaḥ karī devo harṣaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyekākī kālaṃ tamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:272: atikrānteṣu bahuṣu vāsareṣu kadācittayaiva bhrātṛgamanaduḥkhāsikayā dattaprajāgarasibhāgaśeṣāyāṃ triyāmāyāṃ yāmikena sīyamānāmimāmāryāṃ śuśrāva--

GK19bahcar6u:275: tāṃ ca śrutvā sutarāmanityatābhāvanayā dūyamānahṛdayaḥ prakṣīṇabhūyiṣṭhāyāṃ kṣapāyāṃ kṣaṇamiva nidrāmalabhata /
GK19bahcar6u:282: pratyahaṃ rāhuravikalakāyabandha iva kabandhavati bradhnabimbe ghaṭamāno vibhāvyate /
GK19bahcar6u:284: dine dine dāruṇā diśāṃ dāhā dṛśyante /
GK19bahcar6u:287: niśi niśi itastataḥ prajvalitābhirulkābhirugraṃ grahayuddhamiva viyati vilokayanti vilolatārakāḥ kakubhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:290: asminnasmadvaṃśe kariṇa iva karīraṃ komalamapi kalayataḥ kṛtāntasya kaḥ paripanthī?

GK19bahcar6u:298: duḥkhadūraprarūḍharomṇā mūkenāpi mukhena svāmivyasanamavicchinnairaśrubindubhirvijñāpayantaṃ kuntalaṃ nāma bṛhadaśvavāram,
GK19bahcar6u:304: tasmācca helānirjitamālavānīkamapi gauḍādhipena mithyopacāropacitaviśvāsaṃ muktaśastramekākinaṃ viśrabdhaṃ svabhavana eva bhrātaraṃ vyāpāditamaśrauṣīt /

GK19bahcar6u:327_1: muktaśastraṃ kalaśayonimiva kṛṣṇavartmaprasūtirīdṛśena sarvavīralokavimarditena mṛtyunā śamayedevamāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:328: anāryaṃ ca taṃ muktvā bhāgīrathīphenapaṭalapāṇḍurāḥ keṣāṃ manaḥsu saraḥsu rājahaṃsā iva paraśurāmaparākramasmṛtikṛto na kuryurāryaśauryagṛṇāḥ pakṣapātam /
GK19bahcar6u:334: nāmāpi ca gṛhṇato 'sya pāpakāriṇaḥ pāpamalena lipyata iva me jihvā /
GK19bahcar6u:335: kiṃ vāṅgīkṛtya kāryamāryastena kṣudreṇānupraviśya vigataghṛṇena ghuṇeneva sakalabhuvanāhlādanacaturaścandanastambhaḥ kṣayamupanītaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:336: nūnaṃ nānena mūḍhena madhurasāsvādalubdhena madhvivāryajīvitamākarṣatā bhāvī dṛṣṭaḥ śilīmukhasaṃpātopadravaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:337: nijagṛhadūṣaṇaṃ jālamārgapradīpakena kajjalamivātimalinaṃ kevalamayaśaḥ saṃcitaṃ gauḍādhamena /
GK19bahcar6u:338: ntavāśvevāstamupagatavatyapi tribhuvanacūḍāmaṇau savitari vedhasādiṣṭaḥ satpathaśatrorandhakārasya nigrahāya grahaṣaṇḍavihāraikahariṇādhipaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar6u:339: vinayavidhāyini bhagne 'pi cāṅkuśe vidyata eva vyālavāraṇasya vinayāya sakalamattamātaṅgakumbhasthalasthiraśirobhāgabhiduraḥ khalataraḥ kesarinakharaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:340: tādṛśāḥ kuvaikaṭikā iva tejasviratnavināśakāḥ kasya na vadhyāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:342: ' ityevamabhidadhata evāsya piturapi mitraṃ senāpatiḥ samagravigrahaprāgraharo haritālaśailāvadātadehaḥ pariṇatapraguṇasālaprakāṇḍaprakāśaḥ prāṃśuḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:346: kathamapi sāramayeṣu śiroruheṣu śaśikaranikarasitasaralaśiroruhasaṭālāṃ saiṃhīmiva niṣkapaṭaparākramarasaracitāṃ saṃkrānto jīvannevajātim,
GK19bahcar6u:348: dhavalasthūlaguñjāpicchapracchāditakapolabhāgabhāsvareṇa vamanniva vikramakālamakāle 'pi vikāśikāśakānanaviśadaṃ śaradārambhaṃ bhīmena mukhena,
GK19bahcar6u:349: mṛtamapi hṛdayasthitaṃ svāminamiva sitacāmareṇa vījayannābhilambena kūrcakalāpena,
GK19bahcar6u:376: saṃnidhāvevasamupaviṣṭaḥ siṃhanādanāmā svareṇaiva dundubhighoṣagambhīreṇa subhaṭānāṃ samararasamānayanvijñāpitavān--
GK19bahcar6u:377: “deva/ na vkacitkṛtāśrayayā malinayā malinatarāḥ kokilayā kākā iva kāpuruṣā hatalakṣmyā vipralabhyamānamātmānaṃ na cetayante /
GK19bahcar6u:378: śriyo hi doṣā andhatādayaḥ kāmalā vikārāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:380: kiṃ vā karotu varākaḥ yanātibhīrutayā nityaparāṅmukhena natu dṛṣṭānyeva sarvātiśāyiśauryātiśayaśvayathukapilakapolapulakapallavitakopānalāni kupitānāṃ tejasvināṃ mukhāni /
GK19bahcar6u:381: nāsau tapasvī jānātyevaṃ yathābhicārā iva viprakṛtāḥ sadyaḥ sakalakulapralayamupāharanti manasvina iti /
GK19bahcar6u:384: manasvināṃ hi pradhanapradhānadhane dhanuṣi dhriyamāṇe sati ca kamalākalahaṃsīkelikuvalayakānane kṛpāṇe kṛpaṇopāyāḥ payodhimathanaprabhṛtayo 'pi śrīmamatthānasya kiṃ punarīdṛśāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:385_0: yeṣāṃ ca dhātrā dharitrīṃ trātuṃ niyuktāḥ svayamasamarthā iva kulaśakarkaśabhujaparighapraharaṇahetorudgiranti
GK19bahcar6u:385_1: girayo 'pi lohāni te kathamiva bāhuśālino manasāpi vimalayaśobhāndhavā dhyāyeyurakāryam /
GK19bahcar6u:386: sarvagrahābhibhavabhāsvarāṇāṃ hi subhaṭakarāṇāmagrato diggrahaṇe paṅgavaḥ pataṅgakarāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:387: mahāmahiṣaśṛṅgataraṅgabhaṅgabhahgurabhīṣaṇāntarālā lokapravādamātreṇa ca dakṣiṇāśā paramārthato bhaṭamrukuṭiradhivāso yamasya /
GK19bahcar6u:388: citraṃ ca yadunmuktasiṃhanādānāṃ sahasā sāhasarabhasarasaromāñcakaṇṭakanikareṇa saha na niryānti saṭāḥ śūrāṇāṃ raṇeṣu /
GK19bahcar6u:389: dvayameva ca catuḥsāgarasaṃbhṛtasya bhūtisaṃbhārasya bājanaṃ pratipakṣadāhi dāruṇaṃ vaḍavāmukhaṃ vā mahāpuruṣahṛdayaṃ vā /
GK19bahcar6u:391: vṛthāvitatavipulaphaṇābhāro bhujahgānāṃ bhartā bibharti yo bhogena mṛtpiṇḍameva kevalam /
GK19bahcar6u:392: apratihataśāsanākrāntyupabhogasukharasaṃ tu rasāyāṃ dikkuñjarabhārabhāsvaraprakoṣṭhā vīrabāhava eva jānanti /
GK19bahcar6u:394: kātarasya tu śaśina iva hariṇahṛdayasya pāṇḍurapṛṣṭhasya suto dvirātramapi niścalā lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:406: na ca svapnadṛṣṭanaṣṭeṣviva kṣaṇikeṣu śarīreṣu nibadhnanti bandhubuddhiṃ prabuddhāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:408: anavarataprajvalitatejaḥprasarabhāsvarasvabhāvaṃ ca maṇipradopamiva kaluṣaḥ kajjalamalo na spṛśatyevātitejasvinaṃ śokaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:409: satvaṃ sattvavatāmagraṇīḥ prāgraharaḥ prājñānāṃ prathamaḥ samarthānāṃ praṣṭho 'bhijātānāmagresarastejasvināmādirasahiṣṇūnām /
GK19bahcar6u:410: etāśca satatasaṃnihitadhūmāyamānakopāgnayaḥ sulabhāsidhārātoyatṛptayo vikaṭabāhuvanacchāyopagūḍhā dhīratāyā nivāsaśiśirabhūmayaḥ svāyattāḥ subhaṭānāmuraḥkavāṭabhittayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:412: tathā kuru yathā nānyo 'pi kaścidācaratyevaṃ bhūyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:424: yenaiva ca te gataḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ prapitāmaho vā tameva mā hāsīstribhuvanaspṛhaṇīyaṃ panthānam /
GK19bahcar6u:425: avahāya kupuruṣocitāṃ śucaṃ pratipadyasva kulakramāgatāṃ kesarīva kuraṅgīṃ rājalakṣmīm /
GK19bahcar6u:426: deva/ devabhūyaṃ gate narendre duṣṭagauḍabhujaṅgajagdhajīvite ca rājyavardhane vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:428: kṣmāpatīnāṃ śiraḥsu śaratsaviteva lalāṭantapān prayaccha pādanyāsān /
GK19bahcar6u:430_0: api ca hate pitaryekākī tapasvī mṛgaiḥ saha saṃvardhitaḥ sahajabrāhnaṇyamārdavasukumāramanāḥ
GK19bahcar6u:433: na hyayamarātiraktacandanacarcāśiśiropacāramantareṇa sāmyati paribhavānalapacyamānadehasya devasya duḥkhadāhajvara sudāruṇaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:439: itarathā hi me gṛhītabhuvi bhogināthe 'pi dāyādadṛṣṭirīrṣyālorbhujasya /
GK19bahcar6u:441: upari gacchatīcchati nigrahāya grahagaṇe 'pi bhrūlatā calitum /
GK19bahcar6u:446: kiṃ punarīdṛśe durjāte jāte jātāmarṣanirbhare ca manasi nāstyevāvakāśaḥ sokakriyākaraṇasya?
GK19bahcar6u:447: api ca hṛdayaviṣamaśalye musalye jīvati jālme jagadvigahite gauḍādhipādhamacaṇḍāle jihremi śuṣkādharapuṭaḥ pījeva pratikāraśūnyaṃ śucā śūtkartum /
GK19bahcar6u:452_1: nirgauḍaṃ gāṃ na karomi tatastanūnapāti pītasarpiṣi pataṅga iva pātakī pātayāmyātmānam'
GK19bahcar6u:457: ā guhyakagehinīparimalasugandhigandhapāṣāṇavāsitaguhāgṛhācca gandhamādanāt sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ sajjīkriyantāṃ karāḥ karadānāya śastragrahaṇāya vā,
GK19bahcar6u:467: paṅgoriva mekuto nivṛttistāvadyāvanna kṛtaḥ sarvadvīpāntarasaṃcārī sakalanarapatimukuṭamaṇiśilālokamayaḥ pādalepaḥ' /
GK19bahcar6u:468: iti kṛtaniścayaśca muktāsthāno visarjitarājalokaḥ snānārambhākāṅkṣī sabhāmatyākṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:470: agalacca darpaprasara iva śrutapratijñasya śāmyadūṣmā divasastribhuvanasya /
GK19bahcar6u:471: tataśca nijādhikārāpahārabhīta iva bhagavatyapi vkāpi gate gatatejasyahimabhāsi,
GK19bahcar6u:474: bhuvanavyāpinīṃ sandhyāṃ pratijñāmiva mānayati nataśirasi ghaṭitāñjalivane jane sakale,
GK19bahcar6u:475: svapadacyuticakitadikpāladīyamānābhralihalohaprākāravalayakalitāsvi va bahalatimiramālātiraudhīyamānāsu dikṣu pradoṣāsthāne nāticiraṃ tasthau /
GK19bahcar6u:476: namannṛpalokalolāṃśukapavanakampitaśikhairdīpikācakravālairapi praṇamyamāna iva prāhiṇollokaṃ pratiṣiddhaparijanapraveśaśca śayanagṛhaṃ prāviśat /
GK19bahcar6u:478: dīpadvitīyaṃ ca tamabhisara iva labdhāvasarastarasā bhrātṛśoko jagrāha /
GK19bahcar6u:485: kathaṃ cāsya me hatahṛdayasyāryavirahe sakṛdapi yuktaṃ samacchvasitum /
GK19bahcar6u:490: dagdharoṣāntaritaśucā suciraṃ ruditamapi na muktakaṇṭhaṃ gataghṛṇena mayā /
GK19bahcar6u:492: lokayātrāmātranibandhanā bāndhavatā yatrāhamapi nāma para ivārye svargasthe svastha ivāse /
GK19bahcar6u:493: daivahatakena phalamāsāditamīdṛśi parasparaprītibandhanirvṛtahṛdaye sukhabhāji bhrātṛmithune vighaṭite /
GK19bahcar6u:494: tathā ca candramayā iva jagadāhlādino lokāntarībhūtasya lagnacitāgnaya ivāryasya ta eva dahanti guṇāḥ ityetāni cānyāni ca hṛdayena paryadevata /
GK19bahcar6u:495: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ pratīhāramādideśāśeṣagajasādhanādhikṛtaṃ skandaguptaṃ draṣṭumicchāmīti /
GK19bahcar6u:516: atisnigdhamadhuradhavalaviśālatayā pītakṣīrodeneva pibannīkṣaṇayugmāyāmena diśāmāyāmaṃ merutaṭādapi vikaṭavipulālikaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:518: ātmasthasamastamattamātaṅgasādhano 'pyaspṛṣṭo madena bhūtimānapi snehamayaḥ pārthivo 'pi guṇamayaḥ kariṇāmiva dānavatāmupari sthitaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:525: upaviṣṭaṃ ca nātinikaṭe taṃ tadā jagāda devo harṣaḥ--
GK19bahcar6u:529: ityevamabhihitaśca pramamya vyajñāpayat--“kṛtamavadhārayatu svāmī samādiṣṭaṃ kitu svalpaṃ vijñapyamasti bhartṛbhakteḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:531: devena hi puṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtasyābhijanasyābijātyasya sahajasya tejasodikkarikarapralambasya bāhuyugalasyāsādhāraṇasya ca sodarasnehasya sarvaṃ sadṛśamupakrāntam /
GK19bahcar6u:532: kākodarābidhānāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ kṛmayo 'pi na mṛṣyanti nikāraṃ kimuta bhavādṛśāstejasāṃ rāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:533: kevalaṃ devarājyavardhanodantena kiyadapi dṛṣṭameva devena durjanadaurātmyam /
GK19bahcar6u:534: ridṛśāḥ khalu lokasvabhāvāḥ pratigrāmaṃ pratinagaraṃ pratideśaṃ pratidvīpaṃ pratidiśaṃ ca bhinnā veśāścākārāścāhārāśca vyāhārāśca vyavahārāśca janapadānām /
GK19bahcar6u:540: cūḍāmaṇilagnalekhapratibimbavācitākṣarā ca cārucāmokaracāmaragrāhiṇī yamatāṃ yayau yavaneśvarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:541: lobhabahulaṃ ca bahulaniśi nidhānamutkhanantamutkhātakhaḍgapramāthinī mamantha māthuraṃ bṛhadrathaṃ vidūrathavarūthinī /
GK19bahcar6u:542: nāgavanavihāraśīlaṃ ca māyāmātaṅgāṅgānnirgatā mahāsenasainikā vatsapatiṃ nyayaṃsiṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:543: atidayitalāsyasya ca śailūṣamadyamadhyāsya mūrdhānamasilatayā mṛṇālamivālunādagnimitrātmajasya sumitrasya mitradevaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:546: senānīranāryo mauryaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ pipeṣa puṣyamitraḥ svāminam /
GK19bahcar6u:547: āścaryakutūhalī ca daṇḍopanatayavananirmitena nabhastalayāyinā yantrayānenānīyata vkāpi kākavarṇaḥ śaiśunāgiśca nagaropakaṇṭhe kaṇṭhe nicakṛte nistriṃśena /
GK19bahcar6u:548: atistrīsaṅgaratamanaṅgaparavasaṃ śuṅgamamātyo vasudevo devabhūtidāsīduhitrā devīvyañjanayā vītajīvitamakārayat /
GK19bahcar6u:551: mahākālamahe ca manāmāṃsavikrayavādavātūlaṃ vetālastālajaṅgho jaghāna jaghanyajaṃ pradyotasya pauṇakiṃ kumāraṃ kumārasenam /
GK19bahcar6u:553: strīviśvāsinasca mahādevīgṛhagūḍhabhittibhāgbhūtvā bhrātā bhadrasenasyābhavanmṛtyave kāliṅgasya vīrasenaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:555: utsārakaruciṃ carahasi sasacivameva dūrīcakāra cakoranāthaṃ śūdrakadūtaścandraketuṃ jīvitāt /
GK19bahcar6u:556: mṛgayāsaktasya ca mathnato gaṇḍakānuddaṇḍanaḍvalanalavananilīnāsca campādhipacamūcarabhaṭāscāmuṇḍīpaterācemuḥ prāṇān puṣkarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:557: bandirāgaparaṃ ca paraprayuktā jayaśabdamukharamukhā maṅkhā maukhariṃ mūrkhaṃ kṣatravarmāṇamudakhanan /
GK19bahcar6u:558: aripure ca parakalatrakāmukaṃ kāminīveśaguptaśca candraguptaḥ śakapatimaśātayaditi /
GK19bahcar6u:559: pramattānāṃ ca pramadākṛtā api pramādāḥ śrutiviṣayamāgatā eva devasya /
GK19bahcar6u:560: yathā madhumoditaṃ madhurakasaṃliptairlājaiḥ suprabhā putrarājyārthaṃ mahāsena kāśirājaṃ jaghāna /
GK19bahcar6u:561: vyājajanitakandarpadarpā ca darpaṇena kṣuradhārāparyantenāyodhyādhipatiṃ parantapaṃ ratnavatī jārūthyam,
GK19bahcar6u:562: viṣacūrṇacumbitamakarandena ca karṇendīvareṇa devakī devarānuruktā devasenaṃ sauhnyam,
GK19bahcar6u:563: yogaparāgavirasavarṣiṇā ca maṇinūpureṇa vallabhā sapatnīruṣā vairantyaṃ rantidevam,
GK19bahcar6u:564: veṇīvinigūḍhena ca śastreṇa bindumatīṃ vṛṣṇiṃ vindūratham,
GK19bahcar6u:565: rasadigdhamadyena ca mekhalāmaṇinā hasavatī sauvīraṃ vorasenam,
GK19bahcar6u:566: adṛśyāgadaviliptavadanā ca viṣavāruṇīgaṇḍūṣapāyanena pauravī pauraveśvaraṃ somakam' /
GK19bahcar6u:569: tataśca tathā kṛtapratijñe prayāṇaṃ vijayāya diśāṃ samādiśati deve harṣe gatāyuṣāṃ pratisāmantānāmudavasiteṣu bahurūpāṇyupaliṅgāni vitenire /
GK19bahcar6u:572: ciraṃ vivṛtavikṛtavadanaviva raviniḥsṛtavahnivisarā vāsare 'pi virasaṃ viresuściramaśivārthamaśivāḥ śivāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:581: samāghrātayamamahiṣagandhā iva tāmyantaḥ stambakarimapi harayo haritaṃ navayavasaṃ na ceruḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:588: vadhyālaṅkāraraktacandanarasacchaṭā ivālakṣyanta śūrāṇāṃ patitāḥ śarīreṣu vikasitabandhūkakusumaśoṇitaśociṣaḥ śoṇitavṛṣṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:589: paryagnīkurvāṇā iva vinaśvarīṃ śriyamaviralasphuratsphuliṅgāhgārodgāradagdhatārāgaṇā gaṇaśaḥ patantaḥ prajvalanto na vyaraṃsiṣurulkādaṇḍāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:590: prathamameva pratihārīvāpaharantī pratibhavanaṃ cāmarātapatravyajanāni paruṣā babhrāma vātyeti /
GK19bahcar6u:591: iti śrībāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite rājapratijñāvarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha ucchvāsaḥ/
